im a psychopath im never keepin it plain lyrical murder is somethin ive been about ever since i was a little kid doodlin in class drew a picture of my teacher bullet in his head ruler in his ass with a toilet in front of him throwin up pissed off prolly symbolic of this thought sick taught til my inner enemy interrupts im havin nightmares of leavin behind my dreams with anything less than a full bank its like im general hong  and im standin in front of a gun im puttin myself in the way of a bullet to pull rank the hood is over my eyes but the wool aint yeah got the mentality of bein with a wizard every award show we dont even get considered how do you sell somethin thats so lyrical to a kid who wouldnt know what was hittin if it hit him now i wanna talk about these niggas from detroit before me and shady who was thinkin bout detroit we put the world onto it so watch how you say fuck me you just might jinx yourself whoops your girl gon do it cause i was in that 911 in chicago 911 at the same time i had already been grindin since 97 thats longevity and if you think youre lyrically better you better be a killer
